title: The Opportunity class
creator_credit: Richard Jones and Royal College of Art (Great Britain). Dept. of Film and Television
brief_description: A nursery class where handicapped and normal children mix in equal numbers, and where a support program for mothers of the handicapped is arranged. The progress of the children is followed from the nursery to later stages of their education. The attitudes of parents, nursery staff and the children’s later teachers are also explored.
